headline: Defense Stocks Jump After Trump Calls for $1.5 Trillion Defense Budget
summary: U.S. defense companies rallied premarket after President Trump called for a $1.5 trillion defense budget, more than $500 billion more than the Pentagon is expected to receive this fiscal year.  Trump said the increased budget was necessary “especially in these very troubled and dangerous times,” in a social-media post late Wednesday.  Shares of Northrop Grumman, Lockheed Martin, L3Harris Technologies and RTX jumped between 5% and 9% in premarket trading.

content.title: Defense Stocks Jump After Trump Calls for $1.5 Trillion Defense Budget
content.summary: U.S. defense companies rallied premarket after President Trump called for a $1.5 trillion defense budget, more than $500 billion more than the Pentagon is expected to receive this fiscal year.  Trump said the increased budget was necessary “especially in these very troubled and dangerous times,” in a social-media post late Wednesday.  Shares of Northrop Grumman, Lockheed Martin, L3Harris Technologies and RTX jumped between 5% and 9% in premarket trading.

headline: Boeing, Defense Stocks Rally After Trump Calls for Huge Defense Budget
summary: U.S. defense companies rallied after President Trump called for a $1.5 trillion defense budget, more than $500 billion more than the Pentagon is expected to receive this fiscal year.  Trump said the increased budget was necessary “especially in these very troubled and dangerous times,” in a social-media post late Wednesday.  Shares of Northrop Grumman, Lockheed Martin, L3Harris and RTX jumped between 4% and 8.7%.

content.title: Boeing, Defense Stocks Rally After Trump Calls for Huge Defense Budget
content.summary: U.S. defense companies rallied after President Trump called for a $1.5 trillion defense budget, more than $500 billion more than the Pentagon is expected to receive this fiscal year.  Trump said the increased budget was necessary “especially in these very troubled and dangerous times,” in a social-media post late Wednesday.  Shares of Northrop Grumman, Lockheed Martin, L3Harris and RTX jumped between 4% and 8.7%.
